en.main_subtext: We are proud to present our game N치tt칰ruval that brings joy, laughter and science to anyone who plays it. The game is being funded via Gamefound and you can make your pledge there to secure a copy for you, yours and even an educational center if you are feeling charitable.
en.call_to_action_paragraph: This is a limited time crowdfunding project so to get your hands on a copy you have to pledge or get a grown up to do it for you!
en.demo_front: The front of the basic card
en.demo_back: The back of each card, all cards including add ons
en.demo_fantasy: A blank fantasy card were your design might become a real card
en.justin_text: The top dog behind the project and when he's not out walking he's on the trail of securty breaches.
en.kate_text: This bug has been buzzing around the look and feel of the project, and possibly even smell.
en.valborg_text: Between fighting dragons and solving sudokus this bird mama tried to catch them all
en.rokkvi_text: his young man's favorite scientist is David Attenborogh, and he can't wait to tell you facts about animals you've never heard of.
en.history_part_1: R칬kkvi 뤢r, who's favorite scientist is Sir David Frederick Attenborough, asked his mother one day to create "little cards" with information about animals. Valborg, his mother, started right away making a dataset of the suggested animals. Then the dataset needed some uniformity and a discussion started between the two about what sort of statistics are universal enough to be able to quantify over most animals? Speed, how long they sleep, number of eyes, average distance traveled, were all mentioned at one point or another during the process but ultimately discarded, well the number of eyes is easily quantifiable but not very diverse. The statistics that did end up on the card were weight of an adult, length (from head to toe) of an adult, how many offspring and adult produces in one bout, average lifetime in the wild of an adult, number of feet of a healthy adult (the average would always be lower than that, like the average number of hands on people is less than two). Now here are 5 numbers that can be checked in nature and there wasn't any other category they could think of that would fit the criteria of universallly available of most animals. So they started making the cards, mind you they were more like spreadsheet printouts than game cards, and they realized that if they could add one more category they would be able to use a dice and make a game of the, essentially, flashcards. So they made a program count the numbers in the scientific name and that became a stat. After the dice was brought in there was no going back, Valborg made a program that churnes out printables for cards that fit 9 on an A4 for all 13 animals from the dataset, which then grew but small number of cards didn't stop us from playing the game profusively. Anytime they added animals to the deck they always added nine at a time to make use of the paper (why 13 then you ask? Mistakes.). This deck is therefore ever expanding and they have been playing and one time Justin came over with his wife and played a few rounds.
en.history_part_2: Justin could see potential in the game already, but had doubts about Valborg's inkscape graphic design. He was already a publisher of a few other games and knew what he was getting himself into. He got in touch with one of his previous contacts in the printing buisness and got them to do a prototype of the game, one for him in English and one for Valborg and R칬kkvi in Icelandic, but with a much better design, better size and better paper. When the game arrived the news was that each box would need to retail at about 50$ for it to be viable, which was the end of that. But wait, there is more. Justin didn't just give up like that, he contacted other sources and got quotes and there was a chance for this happening and for as little as 20$ and that was a number they could work with. Justin had done an amazing job at redesigning the cards but thought it would be best to bring in a professional. Kate Estrop was that professional, they are a designer that specializes in animal, and more specifically bug, illustrations and they were excited to be on this team, and dare we say made even Justin's fancy card design look like yesterday's news
en.crowdfunding_text_1: Gamefound is a crowdfunding platform. Crowdfunding is the practice of funding a project or venture by raising money from a large number of people, typically via the internet. In short, it is a way to make small independent ventures possible because the need for capital in the beginning of the project is not necessary. So this is not an online store, this is a way for you pay for a game that we then promise to make as long as enough people do that, if the project does not gain enough traction and you have already spent money on it and it does not get printed you will get your money back.
en.crowdfunding_text_2: There are more things to buy from the site as well like stickers, posters and t-shirts, there is a fantasy creature deck and you could pledge to not only get that extra deck, that is compatable with the regular game, but also have your design in there, like R칬kkvi made Krepskplyak the not crab.
en.crowdfunding_text_3: Gamefound is all about making game creation faster and simpler. A platform that brings together supporters and game developers, not just for board games, but for all kinds of gaming projects. Here, creators can concentrate on what they do best, while backers can easily find and support the games they love. They offer a range of services, including crowdfunding, pledge management for any campaign, and marketing support, all in one hassle-free place.

is.main_subtext: Vi칧 kynnum me칧 stolti leikinn N치tt칰ruval sem er fr치b칝rt spil fyrir alla fj칬lskylduna. Spili칧 gengur 칰t 치 a칧 l치ta d칳rin 칰tklj치 s칤n m치l og 칰rskur칧a sigurvegara, og vinningshafarnir eru ekki endilega l칤klegustu d칳rin. Hann hefur l칤ka gert nokkrar vi칧b칝tur vi칧 Cards Against Humanity sem heita Cards Against Identity, 쬬r sem hans 치hugasvi칧 er j칰 t칬lvu칬ryggi.

En 쬰tta er fyrsta spili칧 sem h치n tekur a칧 s칠r, en var ekki hr칝tt vi칧 쬬칧. Kate er nefnilega s칠rfr칝칧ingur 칤 a칧 teikna d칳r og 쮂 s칠rstaklega skord칳r. Tunglfiskurinn h치ns f칠kk st칩rt hlutverk 칤 marka칧sherfer칧inni 쬰gar hann var kominn af teiknibor칧inu.
is.valborg_text: Einu sinni komst 쬰ssi dama 칤 bl칬칧in fyrir a칧 hafa enda칧 칤 fyrsta s칝ti 칤 samkeppni, 쬰gar h칰n haf칧i 칤 raun lent 칤 칬칧ru s칝ti. Hinsvegar hefur h칰n unni칧 s칠r 쬬칧 til fr칝g칧ar a칧 hafa unni칧 ansi marga 칤 kleppara og aldrei komist 칤 bl칬칧in fyrir 쬬칧. Kennaramennta칧ur t칬lvunarfr칝칧ingur me칧 치huga 치 칳msu, 쮂 a칧allega t칬lulegu uppl칳singunum um 쬬칧.
is.rokkvi_text: Ungur ma칧ur sem getur ekki be칧i칧 eftir 쭀칤 a칧 segja 쮂r sta칧reyndir um d칳r, og 쬬칧 l칤klega d칳r sem 쮂 hefur ekki heyrt um. Hann er t칤u 치ra gamall og var 7 치ra 쬰gar hann ba칧 um 쬰ssi spj칬ld, helstu 치hugam치lin eru d칳rafr칝칧i og badminton.
is.history_title: Sagan 치 baki칧 쬰tta allt saman
is.history_part_1: R칬kkvi 뤢r, sem l칤tur miki칧 upp til Sir David Frederick Attenborough, ba칧 m칩칧ur s칤na einn daginn um a칧 gera l칤til spj칬ld me칧 uppl칳singum um d칳r. M칩칧ir hans, Valborg, t칩k strax a칧 safna uppl칳singum um d칳rin sem hann ba칧 um. R칠tt er a칧 nefna a칧 쬰gar vi칧 l칠kum gettu hva칧 칠g er a칧 hugsa 칤 b칤lnum og hann fimm 치ra gamall hugsa칧i um Georg칤u lo칧sel. Uppl칳singarnar 치ttu a칧 vera t칬lulegs e칧lis, eins og lengd, 쭃ngd, hra칧i, me칧al svefnt칤mi, augnafj칬ldi, fjarl칝g칧ir sem d칳ri칧 fer칧ast a칧 sta칧aldri og a칧rar sta칧reyndir sem h칝gt v칝ri a칧 m칝la. En hugmyndin var a칧 safna alltaf s칬mu uppl칳singunum svo margir 쬰ssara flokka voru 칩raunh칝fir e칧a 칩치hugaver칧ir (eins og fj칬ldi augna). 룐ir flokkar sem ur칧u svo fyrir valinu voru lengd d칳rsins f치 toppi til t치ar, fj칬ldi afkv칝ma 칤 einu, me칧al l칤ft칤mi 칤 n치tt칰runni, og allt 쬰tta 치tti vi칧 um fullor칧in d칳r. 칈 kj칬lfari칧 var tveimur au칧fengnum flokkum  b칝tt vi칧. B칝칧i vegna 쬰ss a칧 쮂 v칝ri h칝gt a칧 kasta venjulegum teningi til a칧 velja hva칧a flokk 칝tti a칧 sko칧a og vegna 쬰ss a칧 fj칬gurra hli칧a teningur var ekki til 치 heimilinu. 룐ssir tveir flokkar voru fj칬ldi f칩ta (ekki me칧altali칧, 쭀칤 쬬칧 er alltaf minna en s치 fj칬ldi sem 치 a칧 vera til sta칧ar vegna 쬰ss a칧 f치 d칳r eru me칧 of marga f칝tur) og fj칬ldi stafa 칤 fr칝칧iheiti d칳rsins. 룐gar 쬰ssir flokkar voru til og vi칧 g치tum prenta칧 nokkur spj칬ld me칧 myndum af d칳runum, sem voru alltaf me칧 h칬fundarr칠tti sem gaf kost 치 쭀칤, g치tum vi칧 fari칧 a칧 spila. Vi칧 vorum ekki me칧 nema 11 e칧a 13 spil 쬰gar vi칧 vorum b칰in a칧 finna upp 치 heilm칬rgum lei칧um til a칧 spila. Svo b칝ttist alltaf vi칧 칤 stokkinn, n칤u 칤 einu 쭀칤 vi칧 g치tum prenta칧 쬬u 칰t 9 치 eitt a4 bla칧. Einn daginn 쬰gar Justin og eiginkona hans komu til okkar 칤 heims칩kn spilu칧um vi칧 spili칧 sem honum fannst hafa mikla m칬guleika r치tt fyrir hr치a og einfalda inkscape h칬nnun.
is.history_part_2: Justin f칩r svo heim til Boston og 치kva칧 a칧 betrum b칝ta h칬nnunina t칬luvert og prenta eint칬k af spilinu 치 ensku og 칤slensku. Nema hva칧 a칧 s칰 prentun var ekki f칤silegur m칬guleiki, hvert spil hef칧i 쭃rft a칧 seljast 치 r칰mar 5.000kr og s치 draumur a칧 engu or칧inn. Justin gafst ekki upp og haf칧i samband vi칧 annan traustan prentara sem ger칧i okkur kleift a칧 selja spili칧 치 undir 3.000kr. Kate b칝ttist svo vi칧 칤 h칩pinn 쭀칤 쮂 a칧 Valborgu hafi 쮂씂t miki칧 til koma 칤 uppf칝rslu Justins 치 h칬nnuninni 쮂 komust 쬬u 치 쮂 ni칧urst칬칧u a칧 쬬칧 v칝ri l칤klega best a칧 r치칧f칝ra sig vi칧 s칠rfr칝칧ing. is.crowdfunding_text_1: H칩pfj치rm칬gnun gefur 치hugaf칩lki kost 치 a칧 fara 칰ti 칤 gj칬rninga sem venjulega krefjast t칬luver칧s fj치rmagns 칤 upphafi. Svo 칤 sta칧inn fyrir a칧 b칰a til v칬ru og framlei칧a, til d칝mis gefa 칰t b칩k e칧a geisladisk, 쮂 getur f칩lk sett verkfni칧 inn 칤 h칩pfj치rm칬gnun og gefi칧 f칩lki kost 치 a칧 heita 치 verkefni칧 me칧 치kve칧nu fj치rmagni sem gefur 쬰im 치kve칧in ver칧laun, sem g칝ti 쮂 veri칧 spili칧 e칧a fleiri eint칬k e칧a eitthva칧 enn betra og pers칩nulegra. Svo ef 쮂 hefur mikinn 치huga 치 쭀칤 sem 쮂 hefur heitt 치 쮂 segir칧u sem flestum fr치 쭀칤. 료u verkefni칧 sem hafa n치칧 치kve칧inni l치gmarksfj치rm칬gnun er enn h칝gt a칧 heita 치, 쭀칤 me칧 auknu fj치rmagni er h칝gt a칧 gera 칰tg치funa betri. is.crowdfunding_text_2: 료nnig a칧 쬰gar kom a칧 쭀칤 a칧 velja vettvang fyrir h칩pfj치rm칬gnunina var칧 gamefound fyrir valinu. 료u s칠rh칝fa sig 칤 spilum og leikjum, eru al쬵칩칧leg og traust. Justin hefur reynslu af 쭀칤 a칧 setja verkefni 칤 h칩pfj치rm칬gnun og hefur gefi칧 칰t 칬nnur spil sem f칩ru 쮂 lei칧. N칰 er eftir engu a칧 b칤칧a heldur 칝ttir칧u a칧 k칤kja 치 gamefound n칰na.
is.crowdfunding_text_3: Gamefound er fyrirt칝ki sem gerir s칠r grein fyrir 쭀칤 a칧 치hugaf칩lk getur gert 칩tr칰lega m칬gnu칧 spil, og spilatengd verkefni. Prentarinn sem vi칧 erum b칰in a칧 gera samning vi칧 hefur l칤ka unni칧 치칧ur me칧 verkefni sem f칩ru 칤 gegnum h칩pfj치rm칬gnun. S치 prentari prenta칧i l칤ka Scythe og Wingspan, ef 쬬칧 hefur einhverja 쮂쫚쌀ngu.
